advanced.question: What is the difference between shallow copy and deep copy?
options: Shallow copies pointers, deep copies actual data
advanced.answer: Shallow copies pointers, deep copies actual data

advanced.question: Which feature of C++ allows function overloading?
What is the purpose of the 'virtual' keyword?
options: To allow overriding in derived classes
advanced.answer: To allow overriding in derived classes

advanced.question: Which C++11 feature allows moving resources instead of copying?
Which smart pointer automatically deletes the object when no references remain?
What is the difference between 'struct' and 'class' in C++?
options: Default access: struct is public, class is private
advanced.answer: Default access: struct is public, class is private
